function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective social isolation policies leading to a higher number of infections and deaths","Impact":"Higher mortality rate and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce effective social isolation policies, provide financial support for individuals and businesses during lockdowns","Technologies":"Simulation models, optimization libraries, multi-criteria decision-making tools","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"False dichotomy between healthcare and the economy","Impact":"Negative impact on both healthcare and the economy, leading to increased social costs","Mitigation":"Implement policies that prioritize both healthcare and the economy, provide financial assistance to individuals and businesses affected by lockdowns","Technologies":"Multi-criteria decision-making tools, economic simulation models","People":"Government, economists, business owners, general population","Owner":"Government, economic organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of customization of social intervention scenarios for specific regions","Impact":"Ineffective social intervention strategies for specific regions, leading to higher infections and deaths","Mitigation":"Customize social intervention scenarios based on regional specificities, integrate optimization libraries for automatic scenario creation","Technologies":"Customization software, optimization libraries","People":"Regional policymakers, public health authorities, local communities","Owner":"Regional governments, public health authorities"}]}
